articles.author: Nicholas Megaw
articles.title: US hiring slows more than expected in June - Financial Times
articles.description: Economy adds 209,000 new jobs after unexpected bumper figure in May
articles.content: Jobs growth in the US slowed more than expected in June and was revised lower for the previous two months, in a sign the Federal Reserves aggressive interest rate rises are beginning to cool the labo… [+3030 chars]
